text.0: bring us most mighty splendour thou agni resistless on thy way.
text.1: with overflowing store of wealth mark out for us a path to strength.
text.2: ours art thou wondrous agni by wisdom and bounteousness of power.
text.3: the might of asuras rests on thee like mitra worshipful in act.
text.4: agni increase our means of life increase the house and home of these.
text.5: the men the princes who have won great riches through our hymns of praise.
text.6: bright agni they who deck their songs for thee have horses as their meed.
text.7: the men are mighty in their might they whose high laud as that of heaven awakes thee of its own accord.
text.8: o agni those resplendent flames of thine go valorously forth.
text.9: like lightnings flashing round us like a rattling car that seeks the spoil.
text.10: now agni come to succour us let priests draw nigh to offer gifts.
text.11: and let the patrons of our rites subdue all regions of the earth.
text.12: bring to us agni aṅgiras lauded of old and lauded now.
text.13: invoker wealth to quell the strong that singers may extol thee be near us in fight for our success.
